turns.ai_line: Good morning Doctor. I'm feeling sick, my stomach dey pain me well well after I chop leftover rice yesterday. I also dey feel like to vomit and I don dey purge. This kind thing no ever happen to me before.
Doctor, I no understand wetin you talk. You fit help me check wetin dey cause this wahala for my belle?
turns.user_input: Yes, I'll check. What did you eat?

turns.ai_line: I no understand, doctor. You no talk anything na. Wetin you think say dey cause the pain for my belle?
